mapper.select: select GUID as ID,reftable as columnId,CODE,'['||CODE||']'||NAME as NAME,SUPERGUID as PID,ISLEAF,LEVELNO from code_t_collecttype order by code

select t.GUID, t.ORDERID, t.TABLEID, t.COLLTYPEID, t.ISMAINTABLE, decode(t.ISMAINTABLE,'1','是','0','否') SNAME_ISMAINTABLE, t1.NAME as TABLENAME, t2.DEALNAME, t2.DEALID as DEALTYPE from DICT_T_SETMAINSUBTAB t, DICT_T_MODEL t1, DICT_T_DEALTYPE t2 where lower(t.collTypeID) = lower(#{collTypeID}) and t.TABLEID = t1.TABLEID and t1.DEALTYPE = t2.DEALID order by t.ORDERID
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO DICT_T_SETMAINSUBTAB()
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS GUID, #{lists.COLLTYPEID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{lists.TABLEID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{lists.ORDERID,jdbcType = NUMERIC}, #{lists.ISMAINTABLE,jdbcType = VARCHAR} FROM DUAL
mapper.delete:
delete from DICT_T_SETMAINSUBTAB where GUID in

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DICT_T_SETMAINSUBRELA() VALUES (#{mainSubID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mainTabID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{subTabID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mainFkID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{fkID,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.delete:

mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS GUID FROM DUAL
insert into Code_t_Collecttype(GUID,NAME,CODE,REFTABLE,SUPERGUID) VALUES( #{tableID,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{reftable,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{superid,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT TABLEID,ISMAINTABLE FROM DICT_T_SETMAINSUBTAB WHERE COLLTYPEID=#{code}
mapper.delete: delete from DICT_T_SETMAINSUBRELA where MAINTABID=#{mainTabID} and SUBTABID = #{subTabID}
